query.sql: -- Документы на предварительной обработке, пришедшие по МЭДО с признаком входящий нпа (JBR_INCOMING_NPA=да) select distinct card_id from ( select c1.card_id from ( select c.card_id from card c join attribute_value av on av.card_id = c.card_id and av.attribute_code = 'ADMIN_118450' where c.template_id in (224) and c.status_id in (301) and av.value_id in (1522,1592) --(1588,1521,1522,1592) and EXISTS(select 1 from attribute_value av2 where (av2.card_id = c.card_id) AND (av2.attribute_code='CREATED') AND (av2.date_value >= date_trunc('day', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '366 days')) ) union all select c.card_id from card c where c.template_id in (224) -- шаблон "Входящий" and c.status_id in (102,103) -- в статусе "Исполнение", "Рассмотрение" and NOT EXISTS(select 1 from attribute_value av2 where -- поле "Регистрационный номер" пусто (av2.card_id = c.card_id) AND (av2.attribute_code='JBR_REGD_REGNUM') ) and EXISTS(select 1 from attribute_value av3 where (av3.card_id = c.card_id) AND (av3.attribute_code='CREATED') AND (av3.date_value >= date_trunc('day', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '366 days')) ) ) as c1 -- Дата создания или изменения ... JOIN attribute_value av1 ON (av1.card_id = c1.card_id AND av1.attribute_code in ('CREATED', 'CHANGED')) -- ('CREATED') --ORDER BY av1.DATE_VALUE DESC ) as a where ( EXISTS (select 1 from attribute_value av5 where (av5.card_id = a.card_id) AND (av5.attribute_code='JBR_INCOMING_NPA') AND (av5.value_id = 1449) ) )
